item.title: Back to Pen and Ink
item.description: In the last six months my wife and I have been going through boxes of old books and papers from years pat. You see, we have made some major moves in our 16 years together, including two international moves that basically forced us to start over from zero. the one place we were able to keep some mementos was in my parentsâ€™ basement. This spring my Mom, who allowed us to keep the stuff there for years longer than it should have been (Thanks Mom!
